name: cookcli
description: CookCLI is a command-line tool for parsing, scaling, and organizing recipes using CookLang format. It's ideal for developers or chefs wanting to automate recipe management and cooking workflows.

features.title: Recipe Parsing
features.description: Convert CookLang format into structured data. Standardized recipe management

features.title: Automatic Scaling
features.description: Adjust ingredient quantities for any serving size. Perfect portions every time

features.title: Command
features.description: Powerful CLI tools for recipe automation. Developer-friendly workflow

features.title: Recipe Organization
features.description: Manage large recipe collections efficiently. Keep your cookbook organized

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export recipes to various formats. Share recipes anywhere

features.title: Workflow Automation
features.description: Integrate recipes into cooking apps and systems. Build custom solutions
